WorkItem.ClosedComment: Rawr 4.0.17 Released. If this is still an issue in this new version, please reopen the issue per the Posting Guidelines with all of the necessary information.
WorkItem.Description:
I have my toon's on the EU realm lightning's blade
 
When I wish to reload my chars it suggest the realm name to be Lightnings blade without the apostrophe between g and s.
 
Worse I have a character called Phântôm and it get shifted to Ph%c3%a2nt%c3%b4m
 
I use the battle net option for loading and reloading a character.
 
Also I have noticed that the name/spelling in the Stats pane have the same issue.
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Loading Character/realm vith special chars in name

Comments.Message:
I have found a work arround to this problem.

In the stat fane, Expand to Edit Basic information. 

Now correct your name and realm, and save your characterter.

Even after a reload med battle.net, will your nameand  realm not change their spelling.
